name: Space Expedition
storyline: Space Expedition is an exciting old-school platform game with a colorful mixture of gameplay genres. This is a story of brave astronaut who is to discover what really happened on a distant space station.
summary: Discover new locations, solve puzzles, evade the traps, fight monsters, operate machines and pilot spaceships in a good old pixel-art atmosphere! You'll have to be smart to complete quests, witty to escape danger, attentive to overcome obstacles and brave to fight the enemy in a open combat.
